name: Late 2016 Roblox
description: ***This style is still being updated, if there is something off about it please let me know!*** This style brings back how Roblox used to look near the end of 2016, which is very similar to the one you likely remember but with some differences here and there. This style has released for the one year anniversary of the 2019 Roblox theme!! NOTE: Dark theme does not work well yet, in later releases dark mode will work fine but as of right now it is not fully compatible with this style. Latest screenshot update: 15th November 2020 Some things are either missing or have been changed in the screenshot to both save space and protect my privacy. Everything is there in the actual style!
additional_info:
FIRST RELEASE:

+ First release so there's too much to say but a lot of things have been changed!

Things are a bit rough around the edges at the moment. This style was made from scratch in about a month so don't expect it to be perfect yet, I'm very happy with the progress I've made so far though!

(Also OIogist if you're seeing this, this wasn't made to take away from your style!! I know you're working on your own a bunch nowadays but I wanted to see how close I could get it myself)
